headline: 4 Film & Television Production Stocks to Watch on Dull Industry Trends
summary: Film and television production and distribution companies like WMG, NWSA, LYV and IMAX are thriving due to the heightened consumption of digital entertainment despite heavy spending on original programming and exclusive rights.
